snippet: “Nummer veertien, home,” Guido van der Werve’s most extreme exercise in endurance-art filmmaking, is a 56-minute work for which he swam, biked and ran from Warsaw to Paris.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews Guido van der Werve art film Nummer veertiern, home at Luhring Augustine gallery.
lead_paragraph: “Nummer veertien, home,” Guido van der Werve’s most extreme exercise in endurance-art filmmaking, is a 56-minute work for which he swam, biked and ran from Warsaw to Paris.

headline.seo: GUIDO VAN DER WERVE: ‘Nummer veertien, home’
headline.main: Guido van der Werve: ‘Nummer veertien, home’
headline.print_headline: Guido van der Werve: ‘Nummer veertien, home’
